The drunk slows down and stops before reaching Pacifix, transforming 
into robot mode. He wasn't drunk for now, and the effects wouldn't 
come back untill his battle centers went idle after a little while. 
When they took over, the energon's effect was temporarily deactivated.

"Join you?" he says to Pacifix, "From how long taking a group of five 
enemies took you, I'd say you need some help, yeah. What's the 
mission you need us to join you for?"




--- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> ::Repugnus::
> Repugnus jumps off the drunk. "Po..Potential. Listen here buddy, I 
am 
> Repugnas. One of the heroe's of the ancient battle on the future 
> Earth, so don't give me potential crap, your nothing but a lawn 
mower 
> spark plug."
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> > --- Afterburner / Scattershot / Nosecone / Pacifix ---
> > 
> > Afterburner asks Hoist impatiently, "Arright, now what?"
> > 
> > Scattershot dusts off his hands, and looks up. "The next job will 
> > probabably make sure that the roof has a big enough hole in it 
for 
> > the Hidden One to make it through." He turns back to face Hoist.
> > 
> > Nosecone smiles, and says to Ironhide, "So, are the Technobots 
> > finished cleaning up? We are all anxious to launch."
> > 
> > Pacifix spots the drunk and the bum approaching. "Hello. I am 
> > Pacifix, I was scounting you two out in the battle. You have 
> > potential," he says speaking to the new bots. "You two would be 
> > great additions to the team. Would you like to join?"
